name: Spiced Flavoured Hot Dogs!
description:
Epicness. Duels. Sauces...
These are three of the main features of this game. Fight with up to 3 of your comrades in local multiplayer to prove which one of you is the best, the most ultimate, and hottest dog ever! 

This action-packed game is what will keep your plan party alive. At least for a few minutes ;)

Are you ready to spice things up?

Controls:

Player 1:  Z and X

Player 2:  N and M

Player 3:  Q and W

Player 2:  O and P

How to play?

Start the game and click "HELP" to enter tutorial. It covers most basics, you'll learn the rest on the go!

Credits:
This game (images, sounds and everything except for the things mentioned below) are made by MightyPancake.

Made with love, using LÖVE.

Made with pancake library by MightyPancake

Music by RMVDent

Splash art by PixelRyuu.

This game was made for 2020 LOWREZ game jam! (In a week, because I had no more time :P )

Themes were:
Always Moving
You Are The Weapon

Hotdogs

Slippery
